title: Topics in Broadcast and Electronic Media; Video Innovation
description: Prerequisite: JOUR361 and permission of instructor (jdavidsb@umd.edu). Students will explore the intersection between social media, documentary and broadcast by creating new and innovative ways to "broadcast" news to an audience. The class will encourage an entrepreneurial spirit and give students the opportunity to produce innovative web documentary; immersive, 360 video; original, serial vlogs; and live streaming. Course meets in Annapolis.
